questions.question: THIS ARTICLE DEALS WITH BULLYING BETWEEN PEERS OR MISUSE OF MANAGERIAL AUTHORITY.
AUXILIARY EMPLOYEES WHO HAVE COMPLETED 90 CONSECUTIVE DAYS OF EMPLOYMENT SHALL BE ENTITLED TO THIS MANY DAYS OF PAID ILLINESS LEAVE.
THIS ARTICLE ACKNOWLEDGES THAT THE MANAGEMENT AND DIRECTING OF EMPLOYEES IS RETAINED BY THE EMPLOYER.
THE LATEST MAIN AGREEMENT IS THE SAME NUMBER AS THE AMOUNT OF NERVOUS BREAKDOWNS IN A ROLLING STONE SONG.
questions.answer: WHAT IS THE 19TH MAIN PUBLIC SERVICE AGREEMENT?

questions.question: ARTICLE 8.3 - LIMITS TO PRESENT INTIAL GRIEVANCE, STATES AN EMPLOYEE MUST PRESENT A GRIEVANCE NO LATER THAN THIS.
ACCORDING TO ARTICLE 8.1 THIS IS THE MINIMUM REGULAR HOURS A REGULAR PART TIME EMPLOYEE MUST BE SCHEDULED PER WEEK.
SUBJECT TO SECTION (A) OF ARTICLE 13.1, SECTION (B) SAYS THESE SHALL BE THE CLOTHING ISSUED TO REGULAR EMPLOYEES AND AUXILIARIES WHO HAVE WORKED 1827 HOURS IN A 15 MONTH PERIOD.
questions.answer: WHAT IS 3 SHIRTS/BLOUSES, 2 PAIR OF PANTS, 1 CARDIGAN, 1 BELT?

questions.question: ARTICLE 4.3 (C) WHERE A CUSTOMER COMPLAINT AGAINST A STAFF MEMBER IS NOT RESOLVED, THE EMPLOYER AGREES NOT TO TAKE PUNITIVE ACTION AGAINST AN EMPLOYEE AS A RESULT OF THIS KIND OF COMPLAINT.

THIS ARTICLE SAYS THAT WHEN A TEMPORARY RELIEF IS REQUIRED DUE TO ILLNESS, VACATION, LEAVE OF ABSENCE, ETC., THE EMPLOYER SHALL GIVE REGULAR EMPLOYEES THE OPPORTUNITY TO RELIVE IN HIGHER PAYING POSITIONS.
THE LAST MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING IN THE 19TH COMPONENT AGREEMENT, SAYS THIS PREMIUM DOES NOT APPLY TO REGULAR EMPLOYEES WHO ACCEPT A SHIFT ON A PAID HOLIDAY.

questions.question: DURING THE SCHEDULED TIME PERIODS, TWO ATTEMPTS WITH THIS AMOUNT OF TIME APART WILL BE MADE TO CONTACT THE AUXILIARY.
ON MIDNIGHT ON THESE TWO DATES, ALL AUXILIARY DECLINES ARE REMOVED.
AUXILIARY EMPLOYEES WHO ARE UNAVAILABLE FOR WORK BECAUSE OF ILLNESS AND NOT INCUR A DECLINE, MUST DO THIS AT THE TIMES DESIGNATED BY THE EMPLOYER.
questions.answer: WHAT IS CALL INTO THEIR WORK UNIT?

questions.question: WORKING THESE TWO DAYS AS AN AUXILIARY IS ONE WAY TO QUALIFY FOR COMPENSATION FOR A PAID HOLIDAY.
questions.answer: WHAT IS THE DAY BEFORE AND THE DAY AFTER A PAID HOLIDAY?
